column7: Limited in general to seniors in the curriculum in bioengineering. Any others must have the consent of the department chief advisor. Each student taking the course must register in a minimum of 5 hours either in one term or divided over two terms. 1 to 5 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 10 hours between two semesters. Prerequisite: Senior Standing.
column9: 1 to 5 undergraduate hours. No graduate credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 10 hours between two semesters. Prerequisite: Senior Standing.
